content: अणिमन् {%<ab>m.</ab>%} [अणु-इमनिच्] अणुता-त्वं {@--1@} Minuteness, smallness, thinness, leanness, fineness. {@--2@} Atomic nature. {@--3@} The superhuman power of becoming as small as an atom, one of the 8 powers or siddhis of Śiva; (अणिमा लघिमा प्राप्तिः प्राकाम्यं महिमा तथा . ईशित्वं च वशित्वं च तथा कामावसायिता)
